attributes.title: trash
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app I was greeted with “Keep America Great.” Clearly America is not great- this disinformation is harmful for our country. Good try though!

attributes.title: Actual trash 🤮
attributes.review: This was just bad I mean, come on the whole app is just bad and I really wouldn't at ALL RECOMEND DON’T BOTHER so unnecessary and who wants to look at a Cheeto...not me

attributes.title: Cheeto too spicy for me
attributes.review: I saw a cheeto on the screen so I licked it but the cheeto was so engulfed in the flaming hot hate speech it burned my tongue permanently and now I will never taste the sweet taste of untainted fruits ever again :(

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is horrible. My phone kept crashing. Please do not get this app.

attributes.title: omg🤮-Melissa

attributes.title: my favorite president 🥰😍😍
attributes.review: i was so EXCITED to get this app but unfortunately my phone doesn’t accept racism. anyways have a god day trumpy 😍🥰✨🧚🏻

attributes.review: That was absolutely underwhelming with the promise that Harry styles would greet me. I was sitting there 👁👄👁 just waiting and he never came.
